productCategory.description: Explore tools for creating and animating 3D scenes, motion graphics, and VR. Build models, rig, render, and design interactive visuals for apps, games, and web.
productCategory.name: 3D & Animation

aiSummary.summary: [Mathify](https://www.producthunt.com/products/mathify-4) targets STEM visuals with natural‑language Manim generation, GPU cloud renders, and VTK exports for inspectable 3D. [Gamelabs Studio](https://www.producthunt.com/products/gamelabs-studio) accelerates 2D game pipelines via text-to-animation, looped spritesheets, and IDE integration. [Kaedim](https://www.producthunt.com/products/kaedim) streamlines 3D asset creation with 2D‑to‑3D, auto‑texturing, and production tracking—suited to studios needing faster prototyping, consistent outputs, and managed review workflows across complex pipelines.
